page.title: 08Family Life.
page.content: How a typical family spends its day. When people get up they usually wash and then get dressed.After that they have breakfast,clean their teeth and comb their hair.Then they go to school or work.At lunch time they usually eat something and then return to work.When they get home from work they have dinner or an evening meal then they watch televison.Most people don't go to work on Sunday. Sunday Breakfast:Bacon,eggs,sausages,mushrooms and fried tomatoes. Sunday Lunch:Beef,roast potatoes, new potatoes,peas,carrots,cabbage, cauliflower,runner beans,white sauce, Yorkshire pudding,gravy. Sunday tea:salad etc.Sunday supper: jacket potatoes.With these meals,people drink tea,coffee,wine,pure orange,hot chocolate,Ovaltine.
